item.title: WWE 2K26 CM Punk Showcase Matches and Details Revealed
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to take over the career of the ‚ÄúBest in the World‚Äù CM Punk in WWE 2K26.

Insider Gaming reported several weeks ago that CM Punk, the WWE 2K26 cover star, was planned to be the focal point of this year‚Äôs WWE 2K Showcase. Now, 2K has confirmed the news and is giving fans a deep dive into what to expect this year and the different paths to unlock all Showcase content.

Get Punked in WWE 2K26 Showcase

WWE 2K not only released a written Ringside Report on the forthcoming mode, but also a new trailer narrated by the current WWE World Heavyweight Champion, who breaks down how players can relive his history in some matches and rewrite it in others.

The mode, taking a page from last year‚Äôs Showcase, kicks off with a match from this year‚Äôs WrestleMania, putting players in the middle of the action between Seth Rollins, Roman Reigns, and CM Punk. Other historical bouts include John Cena, Dwayne ‚ÄúThe Rock‚Äù Johnson, The Undertaker, Brock Lesnar, and more. Check out the full list of historical matches below:

  • CM Punk vs. JBL, SummerSlam 2008
  • CM Punk vs. Rey Mysterio, Armageddon 2008
  • CM Punk vs. Randy Orton, WrestleMania 27
  • CM Punk vs. Undertaker, WrestleMania 29
  • CM Punk vs. John Cena, RAW Feb. 2013
  • CM Punk vs. The Rock, Elimination Chamber 2013
  • CM Punk vs Brock Lesnar, SummerSlam 2013
  • CM Punk vs. Drew McIntyre, Bad Blood 2024
  • CM Punk vs. Seth Freakin‚Äô Rollins, RAW Jan. 2025
  • CM Punk vs. Seth Freakin‚Äô Rollins vs. Roman Reigns, WrestleMania 41

There are also three announced ‚ÄúFantasy Warfare‚Äù scenarios. One match sees CM Punk take on Steve Austin. Another sees CM Punk facing off against Eddie Guerrero. The last sees CM Punk teaming up with his wife, AJ Lee, to do battle with The Miz and Maryse. These all take place in a fantasy arena called the ‚ÄúCM Punkvillion.‚Äù

Lastly, there are the what-if scenarios. These include matches that ask questions such as ‚ÄúWhat if CM Punk never left WWE in 2014?‚Äù and ‚ÄúWhat if certain rivalries went differently?‚Äù

Players Can Choose to Run the Gauntlet Instead

For anyone who wants to unlock all the content associated with WWE 2K26‚Äôs Showcase mode, players can simply run the Gauntlet instead. In this mode, you can choose either CM Punk or AJ Lee and try to beat 20 consecutive opponents. In any case, there is a wealth of content to be unlocked.

Speaking of unlockables, this year‚Äôs game introduces a new Ringside Pass system. Learn more about that at this link.

Are you excited to play through the career of CM Punk in WWE 2K26? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Season 2 Launches Next Week
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield 6‚Äôs second season officially launches on February 17, and the action is headed to Germany.

The news was announced via the official drop of a gameplay trailer on February 10. However, the trailer had leaked earlier, revealing that the action centers on the seizure of Hagental Airbase in Bravia.

Battlefield 6 Season 2 Launches With New Map

Two maps will launch next season. The first of which is called ‚ÄúContaminated.‚Äù EA previously stated that the map size falls between Eastwood and Mirak Valley and is comparable to classic Battlefield maps such as St. Quentin Scar from Battlefield 1 or Arras from Battlefield 5. The map is also supposedly designed to specifically address time-to-action concerns.

In the same blog post, EA tells fans that Golmud Railway, a popular map from Battlefield 4, is being rebuilt for modern Battlefield and will be available in a future season.

Battlefield 6 Has Been a Financial Success

Battlefield 6 was the best-selling game of 2025. Also, EA‚Äôs NET bookings increased 38% year over year, driven by the success of Battlefield 6.

Despite this strong start, player numbers have declined due to a lack of post-launch content. Perhaps the launch of season 2 can turn that around.

For more Battlefield 6 on Insider Gaming, check out the latest updates that came to the game and patch 1.1.3.6.

Are you excited for the next season of Battlefield action? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6.5 Adds Elsa Bloodstone and Team-Up Changes
item.content:encoded:
Marvel Rivals is ready to launch Season 6.5. A new hero joins the action, Team-Up abilities change, and more.

Launching on February 13, Elsa Bloodstone will join the action as a Duelist. The news was announced in a social media video presented by GuangGuang from the development team.

Changes to the Team-Up Abilities in Marvel Rivals

The Team-Up Ability changes see the exit of the Fantastic Four Team-Up Ability. In its place, the Invisible Woman will partner with Doctor Strange for the new Psionic Mayhem team-up. Elsa Bloodstone is added to Mr. Pool‚Äôs Interdimensional Toy Box Team-Up.

Bloodstone will team with Deadpool for a new attack that forces enemies to hear Deadpool‚Äôs non-stop talking.

The Thing has been added to Hulk‚Äôs Gamma Charge Team-Up, and Mr. Fantastic joins the Rocket Network team-up with Rocket Raccoon and Star-Lord.

Insider Gaming will update this post with additional details once the full patch notes are released.

Are you excited for the changes coming to the next patch of Marvel Rivals? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
